verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of the sons of Korah.) Hear <WH8085> this, <WH384> all <WH3605> peoples; <WH5971> Give <WH238> ear, <WH238> all <WH3605> inhabitants <WH3427> of the world, <WH2465>
Both <WH1571> low <WH1121> <WH120> and high, <WH1121> <WH376> Rich <WH6223> and poor <WH34> together. <WH3162>
My mouth <WH6310> will speak <WH1696> wisdom; <WH2451> And the meditation <WH1900> of my heart <WH3820> [will be] understanding. <WH8394>
I will incline <WH5186> my ear <WH241> to a proverb; <WH4912> I will express <WH6605> my riddle <WH2420> on the harp. <WH3658>
Why <WH4100> should I fear <WH3372> in days <WH3117> of adversity, <WH9563> When the iniquity <WH5771> of my foes <WH6120> surrounds <WH5437> me,
Even those who trust <WH982> in their wealth, <WH2428> And boast <WH1984> in the abundance <WH7230> of their riches <WH6239>?
No <WH3808> man <WH376> can by any <WH6299> means <WH6299> redeem <WH6299> [his] brother, <WH251> Or <WH3808> give <WH5414> to God <WH430> a ransom <WH3724> for him –
For the redemption <WH9445> of his soul <WH5315> is costly, <WH3365> And he should cease <WH2308> [trying] forever <WH5769> –
That he should live <WH2421> on eternally; <WH5331> That he should not undergo <WH7845> decay. <WH7845>

For he sees <WH7200> [that even] wise <WH2450> men <WH2450> die; <WH4191> The stupid <WH3684> and the senseless <WH1198> alike <WH3162> perish, And leave <WH6> their wealth <WH5800> to others. <WH2428>

Their inner <WH7130> thought <WH7130> is, [that] their houses <WH1004> are forever, <WH5769> [And] their dwelling <WH4908> places <WH4908> to all <WH1755> generations; <WH1755> They have called <WH7121> their lands <WH127> after their own names. <WH8034>
But man <WH120> in [his] pomp <WH3366> will not endure; <WH3885> He is like <WH4911> the beasts <WH929> that perish. <WH1820>
This <WH2088> is the way <WH1870> of those who are foolish, <WH3689> And of those after <WH310> them who approve <WH7521> their words. <WH6310> Selah. <WH5542>

As sheep <WH6629> they are appointed <WH8371> for Sheol; <WH7585> Death <WH4194> shall be their shepherd; <WH7462> And the upright <WH3477> shall rule <WH7287> over them in the morning; <WH1242> And their form <WH6736> shall be for Sheol <WH7585> to consume, <WH1086> So <WH4480> that they have no <WH4480> habitation. <WH2073>
But God <WH430> will redeem <WH6299> my soul <WH5315> from the power <WH3027> of Sheol; <WH7585> For He will receive <WH3947> me. Selah. <WH5542>
Do not be afraid <WH3372> when <WH3588> a man <WH376> becomes <WH6238> rich, <WH6238> When <WH3588> the glory <WH9202> of his house <WH1004> is increased; <WH7235>
For when <WH3588> he dies <WH4194> he will carry <WH3947> nothing <WH3808> <WH3605> away; His glory <WH9202> will not descend <WH3381> after <WH310> him.
Though <WH3588> while he lives <WH9132> he congratulates <WH1288> himself <WH5315> – And though [men] praise <WH3034> you when <WH3588> you do <WH3190> well <WH3190> for yourself –
He shall go <WH935> to the generation <WH1755> of his fathers; They shall never <WH1> <WH3808> <WH5704> see <WH5331> the light. <WH7200>
Man <WH120> in [his] pomp, <WH3366> yet without <WH3808> understanding, <WH995> Is like <WH4911> the beasts <WH929> that perish. <WH1820>
